# Network of data scientists working 

The `SSPHub` aims at fostering collaboration and exchange among  _data scientists_ from the [French Official Statistical Office](https://www.insee.fr/fr/information/1302192).

Details about the network are available on the [about webpage](about.qmd).

Innovative projects can be found on the [dedicated webpage](project.qmd).
